title: Pikes
content:
: This weapon is Invisible while equipped. It loses this property for 2 rounds on a missed Attack Roll.

Rush AttackPiercing Strike

Weapon Enchantment +2

Break the Unbroken: Deals an additional 1~10 Piercing damage to targets that still have all their hit points.Death Drinker: When you reduce a target to 0 hit points, you gain 2-20 hit points temporary hit points.
